string-array.name: place_details
string-array.item: Be an auto rider helps you find other riders nearby that have created an auto ride and are going to the same destination as you. This helps you save some money every time you ride an auto. Also since charges on services like Ola Auto and Jugnoo are much less compared to conventional autos run by auto unions there is a big difference in the amount you need to pay using this service.

Be a cab rider helps you find other riders nearby that have created a cab ride and are going to the same destination as you. This helps you save some money every time you ride an cab. Cabs are usually very costly when taken alone but with the help of rider you can find other people who wish to go to the same destination. Thus you can sit easily in comfort and enjoy the AC in the cab. Sit back and be a Rider.

Create a ride helps you create a cab or an auto ride whichever you prefer. Other Riders nearby who also wish to go to same place can contact you via the app and you dont need to share your personal information such as phone number or email with strangers. Once you create a ride other users can instantly find your ride and contact you via the app.
